text: Begumon kasone, ki kufr varzidaand va ma'ʙudi ʙarhaqro inkor kardaand dar ruzi qijomat hangome, ki ʙa duzax vorid savand, dar in hangom nigahʙononi cahannam ʙarojason nido mezanand, ki: haqqo, ki xasm va dusmanii Alloh dar dunjo az xasm va dusmanii sumo dar in ruz nisʙat ʙo xudaton ʙuzurgtar va ʙestar ast. Zero ʙa sui imon da'vat mesuded, pas sumo inkor mekarded
